isis.stitle: Lucas Varity/TRW Hydraulic Antilock Brake System - INSTALL - REAR WHEEL SENSOR

important.para: It may be necessary to transfer the wire retainers from the old wheel speed sensor wire to the replacement part. Use caution installing the retainers on the new wire to ensure it is not damaged.

step1.para:
Push the sensor spring clip into the mounting block
until it stops .

note.para: Be sure the sensor spring clip is installed with the flange stops on the inboard side (vehicle inboard).

step1.para: Push the sensor completely into the sensor spring clip until it contacts the tooth wheel. No clearance between the sensor and tooth wheel is required.
Route the cable to the frame rail. Be sure to route the cables in a way that will prevent pinching or chafing and will allow sufficient movement for suspension travel.
Connect the sensor cable to the chassis harness.
Install any fasteners that hold the sensor cable in place.
